body.name: Boonatu Dresser for Bedroom with 6 Drawers, White Dresser, Wood Rustic Wide Chest of Drawers with Metal Handles, Modern Bedroom Dresser with Drawers for Closet Hallway, Living Room, White
features: Ample Storage Space: This bedroom dresser assembled dimension measures 47.2" L x 15.5" W x 29.5.0" H. Each drawer measures: 20.98" L x7.68" W x5.43" H. With 6 spacious drawers, this dresser for bedroom offers ample storage space for your clothing, accessories, and personal items. The drawers are designed to accommodate different types of items, helping you keep your belongings organized and easily accessible.

Ultra-stylish & Functional Design: The white dresser features a functional design that prioritizes storage and organization. The dresser's versatile style makes it a great addition to any bedroom decor. Whether your style is modern, traditional, or somewhere in between, the clean lines and timeless design of this dresser will complement a variety of aesthetics.

Used for Multipurpose: Except for being wood dresser in bedroom or as a TV standing in living room, this dresser also can be used as a bedroom storage tool or a side table. This modern dresser can be placed anywhere at home such as kitchen, bedroom, living room for adults.

Easy Assembly & Maintenance: The dressers bedroom furniture comes with comprehensive assembly instructions and all the necessary hardware, making it easy to set up. With minimal effort, you can quickly assemble the dresser and start organizing your belongings. The surfaces of the dresser are usually designed for easy maintenance. Regular dusting and occasional cleaning with a damp cloth are typically sufficient to keep it looking clean and well-maintained.

Quality Construction: Crafted from high-quality engineered wood, or a combination of both, this dresser is built to last. The sturdy construction ensures durability and longevity, allowing you to enjoy its functionality for years to come. The dresser for bedroom with a sturdy frame could support up to 220lbs on the top and 30lbs for each drawer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing our 6 Drawer Dresser for Bedroom A perfect blend of style, functionality, and quality. Designed to meet your storage needs, this dresser offers ample space to store your clothing, accessories, and other essentials. With its sleek design and elegant finish, it adds a touch of sophistication to your bedroom decor.

The perfect vanity size makes it perfect for small spaces that need a lot of storage. For example, put it in the living room as a TV cabinet to store remote controls, DVDs, record players and other items that are placed at hand.

Upgrade your bedroom storage with this functional 6-drawer dresser Enjoy the ample storage space, quality construction, and versatile design that make it a valuable addition to your bedroom furniture. Keep your belongings organized and create a stylish and inviting bedroom retreat.
The high-quality surface is easy to clean, anti-scratch, you can clean the surface with a rag wrung out of water to make it clean like new.
Placing a vanity cabinet next to your vanity table can organize your large cosmetics collection so that what you need is within easy reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dresser for price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice dresser for the price, my wife loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty stirdy dresser especially for the price. Great for my 10 year olds room and she loves it. Holds a good amount of her clothes and supports a TV on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nothing lined up drawers don’t fit properly. I’ve been trying to set it up for 2+ days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little budget dresser!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dresser to go inside my daughter’s closet. The height is just a couple inches higher than a standard nightstand so it was perfect to add extra storage without having to move the hanging rod. Assembly took me close to two hours but it was very easy, instructions were clear and parts were labeled well. A few parts were cracked or bent but the imperfections weren’t prohibitive. I did have to glue one stripped drawer handle. The drawer bottoms are very thin but there is a center brace to provide extra support and they move smoothly. It looks just as pictured and I’m very happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's just OK, came with some damage and could be taller
reviews.reviewText: Good: it is sturdy feeling, solid and the drawer also feels good. The color is consistent and the appearance is exactly as shown in the images.Not so good: The main thing for me is the height. The stand is in a guest room and it's too short next to a modern mattress and foundation. I think if you have a platform with no foundation under the mattress it would work better but for this use, it needs to be about 6" taller. I saw the dimensions when I ordered it so can't complain about that too much.The stand did have damage when it showed up, just some peeling of the veneer on the drawer. It resulted in a hassle because I didn't notice it until it was basically fully assembled, but I would need tj take it apart to ship it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional Elegance for Your Space!
reviews.reviewText: Hey there! I just wanted to share my thoughts on the Boonatu Rustic Dresser with Charging Station. It's an amazing piece of furniture that combines both functionality and style in the best way possible. It has a farmhouse charm that adds a unique touch to my living space, and it caters to my modern need for tech convenience.I really love the fact that it has 1 USB port and 2 power outlets, which allows me to charge all my devices conveniently. The drawer and shelf provide ample storage space, making it a practical addition to my room. The quality of the wood and craftsmanship is amazing, giving the dresser a sturdy and durable feel.The rustic design is so versatile that it blends seamlessly into various decor styles. Whether you're a fan of farmhouse aesthetics or looking to add a unique touch to your space, the Boonatu Rustic Dresser is a fantastic choice.I highly recommend this functional and elegant dresser. The combination of charging convenience and rustic charm makes it a five-star addition to any home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautfiul, quality end table/night stand
reviews.reviewText: This is a great nightstand if you have a low bed, measure prior to purchasing to ensure it will be tall enough. It is beautiful and well designed. It took my husband about an hour to put it together and the parts were very well labeled and packaged. I has a handy wireless charger.
